entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
